messages.message:
Hangman keeps track of the best players, and since that could be you, you might want to register.
If you would rather not register for some reason, use the guest/guest account.

message.p:
For each game won, you gain 20 points, minus one point for each wrong letter guess.
For each game lost, you loose 10 points, so you better try hard to guess the word!
